name: The Great Eggscape
description:
You are a freshly-laid egg in one of Farmer Joe's famous chicken coops. You don't want to be inevitably snatched up by him and turned into an early-morning meal, so you must work your hardest to eggscape!

Use your left and right arrow keys to move. Moving an egg is hard though, so you're only able to push and shove yourself a little ways at a time. Farmer Joe is always keeping a close eye on the coop, so you must be careful and reach the door in a precise number of moves!

Reach the doors, eggscape the coop, and enjoy your freedom..

(Made for Miz Jam 1)
